website_summaries.verdict: This versatile inflatable beer pong table is the perfect pick for customers interested in a multipurpose product.
pros: Comes with six pong balls, 28 drink holders, and four tethering grommets
Can be used for beer pong, social drinking, or as an oversized floating bed
cons: A few buyers report issues with durability

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, thick material
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this all summer...it's been left in the pool in the elements...and it's as good as the day it came 2 1/2 months ago. We used a pump to inflate. We flip it over when not in use, so the holes don't get water in them and mildew forms. A little pink mildew starts anyway, so I just spray with foaming beach every now and then. This thing is exactly as advertised. It's very sturdy! It's fun and challenging. We've even flipped it over to use as a floating table for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: It_Is_Me

customer_reviews.title: I love products that solve problems
customer_reviews.text: I love products that solve problems, and this is definitely one of them. Before receiving this table, there was a constant dilemma of should I play beer pong or should I go swimming. Thanks to this product I can now move on to other life problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Party Entertainment Out There
customer_reviews.text: We live on a large creek, and decided to purchase this for our 4th of July party. This is a great purchase for anyone considering it, and our crowd stayed entertained for hours! The size and quality of the table is great, and it has extra cup holders on the sides for extra drinks. This also has hooks on the outer edge so you can attach rope to keep it in place!
customer_reviews.author: Leah T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: Really great inflatable beer pong table! We bought this for a vacation in Florida and it worked wonderful. We were not easy on it. There was jumping on it and constantly playing with it. Did not run into any issues. Blowing it up was pretty easy/quick(blew it up ourselves no pump) So far so good! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lepph

customer_reviews.title: pool party
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my birthday party , what great fun this was, playing beer pong in the pool. It is very sturdy the solo cups fit perfectly and we had an amazing time. It also doubles as a great lounger and float and is sturdy enough for this "big buy" The kiddos love it as well, (no beer) :)
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! It’s super easy & fast to inflate. Strong material.
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! It’s super easy & fast to inflate. Strong material. Arrived very well packaged with no issues. Our house guests love this game. Everyone says how good this is made. Definitely recommend purchasing this product! My family, friends love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Holt

customer_reviews.title: My best advice - paint the ping pong with glow in ...
customer_reviews.text: Can we just say party time! We used these are our family vacation and honestly - none of us remember the night?! My best advice - paint the ping pong with glow in the dark paint! You won't believe how long you will play this !!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: first day fun - second day ??
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long floatable items should last before they pop a leak but this one lasted maybe 24 hours. I havent spent the time looking for the leak but had minimal use and well games played did not include adult beverages so it wasnt abused. yet its what we wanted I just need to spend the effort to find the leak and there are alot of corners and such to look.
customer_reviews.author: John Mauseth

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after a day
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this and the first time we used it (saturday) it was completely deflated Sunday morning. I am trying to contact the company to get a replacement and have not heard back. i’m not sure if mine was defected or not. after it deflated we put more air in it and the same thing happened. it just won’t hold any air and it should for $35
customer_reviews.author: barry mueller

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool party game!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this float this summer. It is very well made and stable to play on! It’s a blast at all our pool parties. Love that it came with ping pong balls too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Cozadd

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this thinking it would be a great game for the pool. My adult kids love to play beer pong and were excited to get this when it arrived. However this product is horrible quality and ripped and deflated before we even got started playing with it. Great concept, horrible quality...save your money. Very unhappy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC purchase, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to bring to Mexico with us for our destination wedding. Long story short, the inflatable pool beer pong table survived Mexico, made it back to California, and is still alive and kicking. We use this for beer pong, and occasionally as a lounger on its flip side, every single Sunday. I am thoroughly impressed that there isn't any kind of air leak. FANTASTIC purchase, we have had loads of fun with family and friends with this.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Alonso

customer_reviews.title: You know you want it.
customer_reviews.text: This is great...no complaints at all. I didn't realize it came with Ping Pong balls as well which was an added bonus. I like the extra cup holders on the sides for extra drinks. Your friends will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Alleva

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4th of July pool party and it was a hit. Very easy to inflate with an air mattress pump. Seems very sturdy. It was definitely abused a little but has held up well. Super fun and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommended getting this if you spend time in the pool with your friends. This was a huge hit amongst my group of friends and we played it for most of the day. It works well as a pool float as well and has plenty of cup holders
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Olson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday gift for my husband. It fun in the pool but definitely more difficult than the non floating version. Not sure how well it would work in a lake or other natural body of water, but it is perfect in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Kid Proof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at family parties at my grandparent's pool. We have many kids who love to rough house and pop floaties but this has held up! Plus it is so fun and easy to play beer pong in the pool with the adults! Nice, deep inserts for solo cups so you don't have to worry about spillage! Plus bonus ping pong balls!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: fun toy for the pool. easy to inflate. came with ping pong balls.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a summer pool party. definitely got put to good use throughout the day. also came with ping pong balls. seems well made. found a tip online to inflate with the exhaust port of shop vac. the inflate valve on this item has the ability to adjust from a small size valve to a much larger hole, which worked perfect for inflating with shop vac. took less than 20 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Evad714

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: We loved this! Worked great for our pool party! Slightly hard to inflate though but worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this product is nice. comes with balls so I don't have to buy new ones and floats very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement and is a little bit smaller then the first one. The first one had a cooler in the middle so that may have to do with the size. Although we just got this one, the one before lasted a couple years till kids started jumping on. I use it more for a raft to lay out on.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and shipping was quick!! If you want unlimited hours of fun in your pool ORDER this! Not only do we use this for beer pong, we also play cards on this. Convenient for holding drinks as well if your just kicking back in the pool. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Steele

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: Took on vacation. Kids used it as a raft and adults played pong at night. Held up well
customer_reviews.author: DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Thick 👌🏻👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: Seems like very good quality and so far it’s lasted a beating. My 250 lb bro gets on it no problem 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Frutos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to get the cups in when its fully blown up but it's not a big issue. It's definitely more difficult than regular table beer pong but it makes it more fun
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This pong table is the best one we've found. The construction is durable and sturdy and it makes for hours of fun! My only complaint is that the cups don't touch when inserted into the holes. If they could figure out that small design issue it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Korthals

customer_reviews.title: Great floatie
customer_reviews.text: Good quality floatie and was sturdy to play beer pong on! Can also lay on this floatie when not using it for beer pong. We also appreciated the extra cup holders on the side for our own drinks
customer_reviews.author: priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a party and it worked great. Everyone had so much fun. Can also use as a pool float. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mj_photography_webdesign

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game when we are out on the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought for pool parties and never had a leak in spite of rough use. Kept it inflated all season with no problem. Can’t bounce ping pong balls on center, more for straight shots but still worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mallory H

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and very durable
customer_reviews.text: This was the best buy we made during the pandemic. We have such fun playing it with the adult family members in the traditional way, and with the grands when they visit with soft drinks. Makes the pool much more interesting. Works well as a float also. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Floating Pong Table. and by far the best. Sturdy vinyl, and the best part only one air hole to fill. We have used it at least 8 times since we received it two weeks ago. It made our 4th of July pool party!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wood

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until we had a guy jump on it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a bachelor party at a lake. Worked great until we had a guy jump on it on the wood dock and pop it :(
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: 2 of them both with holes out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Well, I sent the first one back and got a replacement. This one also deflates in about an hour - right out of the box! I'm cutting my losses and tossing it in the garbage this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Av8or

customer_reviews.title: Holes
customer_reviews.text: Finally blew it up and it deflated a day later. Never even got to use it!! Found two holes and patched them, but it deflated again. Missed the return window, so I guess I’m out of luck AND money!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Hurwitz

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We use this every weekend at the pool. It's great quality and provides hours of fun! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Probably a little overpriced for what it is but we have had so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: NicNic

customer_reviews.title: Adult Pool Fun
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, hasn't popped yet after a couple of uses. So I'd say sturdy and reusable for many parties. Comes with 6 ping pong balls too. Just need to get cups.
customer_reviews.author: Red Riding Hood

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Had a blast at my pool party with this will use again and again
customer_reviews.author: J Fowler

customer_reviews.title: so I guess it is great for a novelty pool game
customer_reviews.text: The rims of the cups don't touch....so that's a bit of a design flaw. It stays inflated very well, though, so I guess it is great for a novelty pool game.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D

customer_reviews.title: Great for games and as a float!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It blows up really easy and so far has lasted. It's fun for adults but my 8 year old wanted to play also so I put empty cups in and he had a great time playing. When nobody is playing a game, it makes for a great pool float. If somehow it doesn't survive until next summer, I will buy it again, it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Durable and great pool toy. Makes a nice lounge pad as well
customer_reviews.author: saildog2009

customer_reviews.title: Hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this when I was in Punta Cana and when we blew it up, there was a hole in it. I didn’t bring the patching kit because I didn’t think I’d have to on first use. $25 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Hills

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Floating Table
customer_reviews.text: Great floating table, holds the cups very well and is perfectly rigid. Works even as a floaty to lie on or a bat to hit your friends with. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it 2x and it deflate from the sun. Waste of money 😭
customer_reviews.author: Amber i

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool and play
customer_reviews.text: Love this table for the pool or a shallow lake. No need to take a pee break!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy to bring to the pool for pong however ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy to bring to the pool for pong however the game is significantly more difficult since you cant get the cups to touch. Also re-racks are limited to the pre-cut holes. Overall fun for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy playing in the pool with this! All of our family and friends think this is neat!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R. Leonard-shimo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!!! So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I blew this up yesterday and played all day! Had so much fun. Only thing is it’s not great for deeper pools, mines like 4 something deep and I’m only 5 foot so it was kinda hard to see where you were shooting we had to push the cups as far down as they could go.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L

customer_reviews.title: Defective product - couldn’t even play ONCE!
customer_reviews.text: We just inflated this for the first time and it has a hole! It’s on the seam so the “patch kit” is useless. Just tried to order another as we are in an extended summer vacation and they are out of stock! So disappointed. Would have been a great game.
customer_reviews.author: mia romero

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so happy to receive this. We have played the game with beer and with just water. It is fun and everyone who has played has had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: The BEST product I’ve ever bought I never want to play pong without a pool anymore !🙌🏻🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Pietro Massitti

customer_reviews.title: Pool pong so fun
customer_reviews.text: Such a great purchase and so fun.. Took it on a trip with my family everyone had blast playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Go_see_Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Party Item to have
customer_reviews.text: This is great to play beer pong at the pool on a hot summer day. friend love it. Would like to buy a second one to have two games going at once.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Yepes

customer_reviews.title: Super bummed, I was so excited to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: When I inflated mine initially it had a leak so I had to use a patch kit to patch that hole. Within one use it deflated half way, so there must have been another leak somewhere. Super bummed, I was so excited to use this all summer at the lake and it barely stayed inflated through one afternoon. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sueky Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Pool Pong
customer_reviews.text: Pool family fun. College fun. Tailgate fun. I had to buy a second!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great game - held up flawlessly after over 100 games
customer_reviews.text: I just spent a week on vacation and brought this with me - with five 21-23 year olds. They gave this thing a workout - probably over 100 games and it's still going strong! I would absolutely recommend this to anyone looking to add to your pool time fun!
customer_reviews.author: widerightnogoal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Life of the party in Mexico!!!!!!!!!!!! Don't forget your own cups.
customer_reviews.author: michelle green

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This floaty absolutely made our Palm Springs (120 degrees) weekend! A must for every pool party! And a great way to get everyone in the pool to hang out. Keep a cup of water in one of the extra holes so you can clean the ball from pool water. One of the best purchases we've made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and comes with 6 balls to play with!
customer_reviews.author: kdleg10

customer_reviews.title: Hole
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cool concept and perfect size but as other reviews stated, it had a hole. It did come with a patch kit but I could patch it because it was on the rubber when the valve is so it deflated after 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool game to buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. We bought it for the 4th of July and it was a big hit and everyone played it for hours. It’s very fun. I highly recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the summer
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool parties. Only reason I’m giving 4 stars is because there was a hugeeee bug inside of it, super gross and makes me wonder where they had this stored.
customer_reviews.author: katherine Leiva

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Inflated and already had 2 holes in it before it was used once. Had to hunt for and patch holes before I could even use. Wasn’t worth the hassle of reboxing and sending back. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I think customers will have a better time keeping it inflated if they use as intended ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping on time and blew it up right out of the bag in 5 minutes. Will put it to the test this weekend. 6 ping pong balls and leak patch provided. I think customers will have a better time keeping it inflated if they use as intended (don't jump off the roof on it). Pong on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I'll provide an update if it doesn't meet ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'll provide an update if it doesn't meet expectations once blown up. It comes with 6 balls which is nice; no cups though. We're bringing on a trip to Jamaica. It's heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry_Vee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great and so much fun! Also super easy to fill because of the larger fill cap.
customer_reviews.author: Christian F Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Deflated before we even used it
customer_reviews.text: I inflated it and set it in the corner until we were going to use it. We came back about an hour later and it had deflated. We checked to make sure the plug was inserted properly and it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jay E.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This float is GREAT quality. You can tell it is made well and will last longer than cheap floats. Everyone loves playing this in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Maddi C

customer_reviews.title: Leaking air straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I paid for overnight delivery so that I would have it for a party the following day. After putting air in it you could hear that it was leaking. Patched it and still leaking. Not happy that I paid the extra money for a fast delivery and now unable to use it .
customer_reviews.author: Mama M

customer_reviews.title: SO COOL!
customer_reviews.text: This is for beer pong in the pool, but I also use it for just a cup holder and mini table when I have lots of people in the pool. There is 28 cup holes, which is great to use not just for cups, but a pocket for your phone, your sun lotion, the possibilities are endless! I would definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Eschoen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get a hole!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first time, but it somehow got a hole and deflates pretty quickly. It’ll last for about 10 minutes before I need to reinflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good float
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. No leaks. Works well for pong or for laying on and floating.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality was as expected, no leaks, fit standard solo cups. We had a blast!

customer_reviews.title: I’m so mad I spent money on this
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold air at all. We kept having to blow it up after every game. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: deep pockets so cups don't wiggle
customer_reviews.text: came with balls! Big enough to lay on and sun bath when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This literally only lasted one week. It was fun while it lasted. It had a hole I tried to seal it but it didn’t work or must of had another hole.
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Just as you'd expect it to be
customer_reviews.text: The side cupholders sold me. It's also sturdy enough to use as a floatie.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I am the hit of my apartment complex when I bring it out. Fun for all ages. P.S Use water instead of beer :)

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pool Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use at the apartment pool. Is a blast to play. Only negative is that the cups end up getting about a quarter or half inch space between them which is a little annoying.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for vacations / party's etc
customer_reviews.text: It floats! Keeps glasses high enough out of water to prevent pool water from getting in beer. Fun to play and everyone wants to check it out. You can play it out of the water too which is nice. Just find a spot to lay it on and your set.
customer_reviews.author: jamiejk

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FUN!
customer_reviews.text: We have an 8x8 hot tub that we sit in each of the four corners and play this...we just rotate the table. SUPER FUN!!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a single use
customer_reviews.text: First time using and it wouldn't stay inflated! Would not recommend this item. Either defective or not durable at all.

customer_reviews.title: great fun
customer_reviews.text: We have used this beer pong float numerous times. It works like a charm and is a great party game. No problems, holes, or defects so far this summer.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: The cups dont touch and make the pong game 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The cups dont touch and make the pong game 3 times longer. there are some other options that have touching cups, I'd go for one of those next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: very cool party toy
customer_reviews.text: very cool party toy, however it ripped on me after a few weeks.. could have been someones drunken negligence but still, i like this this even after duct taping the hole.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy roberts

customer_reviews.title: The worst part was that it did NOT include the 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: It had yellow discoloring all over it. The worst part was that it did NOT include the 3 ping pong balls as advertised so I spent half of our pool party driving around trying to find some. Overall it's a fun thing to have but I'm returning it because of these issues. I may try again... not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made as its still going strong months ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made as its still going strong months later. Fun for everyone because the kids love playing it too (with soda!)
customer_reviews.author: The Glens

customer_reviews.title: Not a well made product
customer_reviews.text: This product started to leak or got a whole within the first 5 minutes of use. It was very disappointing. I do not think the inflatable was sealed well at all.
customer_reviews.author: andreaaertker

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: My table had a hole in it and will not stay inflated Blew it up 1 time and it won’t stay inflated bummed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun with this. Did have to reinflate each day not a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to play in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play in the pool. Works pretty well but a little harder than regular beer pong due to the way the cups have a lot of space between each one.

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for this float. I have really enjoyed using :)
customer_reviews.author: lauren lartigue

customer_reviews.title: Such a great source of fun for such a low price
customer_reviews.text: Such a great source of fun for such a low price. The only draw back, the bottom of the float that was in the water started turning green.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Fun to be had!
customer_reviews.text: Good for our pool parties! The material is a little thin and the float is smaller than our previous one, but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: DevonH

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun in the pool
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, hours of fun in the pool. Where you use alcohol or koolaid it's fun to play. Well made!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time love this thing for parties

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. Stayed inflated for 10-12 minutes. Complete waste of money. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: KL 93

customer_reviews.title: Boozin' n Cruzin'
customer_reviews.text: Everything you've ever wanted and more. Inflatable pong table, pong cups, and balls. I'll be honest though, it's a BYOB pool party people... heck of a time though!
customer_reviews.author: r.min

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Took on vacation and was easy to pack! Loved that it came with the balls as well
customer_reviews.author: Kristen531

product_meta.title: GoPong Pool Lounge Floating Beer Pong Table Inflatable with Social Floating
product_meta.description: GoPong's Pool Pong Lounge is a premium 6ft floating beer pong table with built in cup holders for social floating. This product is essentially a version of our popular Party Barge, but without the built in cooler. The 6ft x 3ft table includes 10 cup triangles on each end for full size pool pong play. Each side of the raft is also lined with 4 cup holders for social floating, so you and your friends can float and socialize around the table between pong games. The Pool Lounge can also be used as a floating tanning lounge if you're ever able to get it all to yourself. The Pool Lounge includes 6 pong balls (cups not included) and is retail packaged. This is a must have for spring break, summer pool parties, or lake boating. Manufacturer's Note: We inflation test and quality check all rafts before they are packaged, but rarely a bad unit will still slip through. If this happens, we will immediately send a replacement or issue a refund as customer service is our top priority.
feature_bullets: UPGRADE YOUR POOL PARTY: 6 foot floating beer pong table with sideline cup holders, 6 pong balls, and 4 tethering grommets
HOURS OF FUN: Full 10 cup beer pong setup on each side so you can enjoy this classic drinking game and set the life of the party
3 FEATURES IN 1: The versatile GoPong inflatable can be used for games of pool pong, social floating and as a floating lounge
RAPID INFLATION: Don't let your party miss a beat, this float inflates quickly by pump (not included) or mouth
UNIQUE GIFT: Retail boxed for gifting

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
